metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6729 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in thumb.php in MediaWiki before 1.23.10, 1.24.x before 1.24.3, and 1.25.x before 1.25.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the rel404 parameter, which is not properly handled in an error page.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.4-3').
